title: Ep. 45 "But The Drag Is...ft. LeRoy"
description:
LeRoy, who goes by Sanuria Bonet on stage, joins us to discuss what it's like dating in Atlanta, whether men are turned off when he dresses in drag, growing up gay in Louisiana, "tricking" boys, and most importantly he answers the question that everyone asks about the men in Atlanta. "Are there really that many on DL?"

Be sure to hit subscribe and take a listen as he let's it all out the bag!

Follow our guest LeRoy @itsm3l3roy
